original_title: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: Celebrate with Kai-Lan
overview: It’s Chinese New Year, which means a big feast, red envelopes, and friends and family all together! Kai-lan and her friends are thrilled because this year, they are old enough to carry the huge dragon costume. It’s going to take a whole team of friends to carry it for the celebration, and Rintoo is assigned to march in the middle of the dragon.
title: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: Celebrate with Kai-Lan
